net.sf.sprockets.google

Class StreetView.Params

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.sprockets.google.StreetView.Params
  • Enclosing class:
    StreetView

    public static class StreetView.Params
extends Object

    Parameters for the Google Street View Image API service. All methods return their instance so that calls can be chained. For example: 

    Params p = new Params().location("empire state bldg")
         .pitch(30).fov(100).size(360, 480);

    • Constructor Detail

      • StreetView.Params

        public StreetView.Params()

    • Method Detail

      • location

        public StreetView.Params location(double latitude,
                         double longitude)
        Get the image closest to this latitude and longitude.

      • location

        public StreetView.Params location(String location)
        Get the image closest to this location. May be an address, landmark, etc. If location(double, double) is called, this value will be ignored.

      • heading

        public StreetView.Params heading(int degrees)
        Get the image at this compass heading. By default, the camera points at the specified location.

      • pitch

        public StreetView.Params pitch(int degrees)
        Angle the camera up or down from the default of 0 degrees (which is usually flat horizontal).

      • fov

        public StreetView.Params fov(int degrees)
        Adjust the field of view to zoom in (down to 10 degrees) or out (up to 120 degrees). The default FOV is 90 degrees.

      • size

        public StreetView.Params size(int width,
                     int height)
        Get an image with this many pixels. Valid sizes range from 16x16 to 640x640. The default size is 320x320.

      • format

        public String format()
        Get a URL for this request.

      • clear

        public StreetView.Params clear()
        Clear any set parameters so that this instance can be re-used for a new request.
        Since:
        1.1.0
